thread.title: Watch These Brave Parents Smoke Pot With Their Kids For The Very First Time
thread.title_full: Watch These Brave Parents Smoke Pot With Their Kids For The Very First Time

author: Diana Bruk
title: Watch These Brave Parents Smoke Pot With Their Kids For The Very First Time
text:
Watch These Brave Parents Smoke Pot With Their Kids For The Very First Time 
Well, this is awkward. By Diana Bruk Jan 31, 2017 Most people are mortified at the idea of ever being caught smoking pot by their parents, much less ever actually sharing a joint â€” unless it turns out your mom is the type of smoker to just bliss out, fall asleep, and remember nothing the next morning, in which case it might be OK? Still not worth the risk though, really! But that's precisely what the folks at Cut Video (who brought you the delicious awkwardness of exes playing Truth or Drink ) made three golden oldies and their offspring do. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Now, you'd figure that since these people lived through the '70s that they'd know a thing or two about burning the bush, but apparently they were all pretty much newbies... and kind of nervous. Which, for one dad, was well-deserved (yes, he threw up a lil' bit in a bucket, poor thing). But then they all had a lot of fun! Like a lot a lot. And there was some real parent/child bonding happening. Secrets revealed, hugging, crying, the whole thing. So, maybe something to propose at the next big family dinner? It's got to be better than Monopoly or bringing out the childhood photo albums again. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
